name: Beware of the car
description:
Beware of the car - a game in the genre of horror, created with one goal, to frighten its players, to scare so that you forever remain under the impressions of the game and from the developers.

You are Detective Alice, whose task is to help people survive among the supernatural, the world is populated, and you can meet a paranormal every day, although you yourself do not notice it.
Today, before you the task to go to a small town where there is a lot of evil spirits, ghosts took over this city, you need to save all the people who stayed there and stay alive.
You'll travel through the hellish city in your car, yes it's a chorus on the car, well on the car - the first horror of its kind, the horror games have not shown this to you before.

On the way to the result, ghosts, monsters, various phenomena with which you should fight and not die will wait for you, otherwise your mission will be failed. But do not forget about gasoline, you need to refuel in time.

A realistic atmosphere and game graphics.
The game completely gives you the atmosphere, for a deeper plunge into the world of horrors.
The story of horrors begins with a small, just try the game for free.

Features:
- Complete storyline
- A realistic atmosphere of horror
- Realistic soundtrack.

Play and be with us in vkontakte: vk.com/darkplaygame
Play and be with us on facebook: fb.me/darkplaygamees
